comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Rev. H. B. Gwyn resigns as editor of The Churchman (a magazine representing the low church faction of the Protestant Episcopal Church) to seek a new pastorate. New York Times story, July 15, 1913: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9802E0DA153FE633A...

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Note: NYT spells his last name with only one "n".

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started a Wikipedia entry for him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herbert_Britton_Gwyn
